>> It's very simple. Pay us our money for services rendered and we can both put this behind us. I
>> see you decided to ignore the debt owed to Lighthouse. Instead, you are
>> creating further liability for CardConnect for services on an active merchant.
>>
>> It is clear that my Father's departure has brought out the very worst in your "leadership".
>>
>> Call me when you're ready to do the right thing. I am sure counsel will advise on the same.
>>
>> Thanks.
>>
>> Sent from my iPhone

Q. Okay. What is the subject of the payment dispute between Shift4 and Card Connect?
A. I think I answered that in the previous -- it was in one of your earlier questions where you said,
what was the dispute. I said it was in regards to Card Connect refusing to pay for services rendered as
